snippet: A profile of Arvind Kejriwal, an anti-corruption crusader making a foray into politics.
abstract: A profile of Arvind Kejriwal, an anti-corruption crusader making a foray into politics.
lead_paragraph: “Hundreds of reporters stood waiting, everyone expecting a helping of scandal, and Arvind Kejriwal did not disappoint,”Jim Yardley wrote of the activist-turned-politician. “The crowd pressed forward, drawn by the question now shaking India’s political establishment: Who will Arvind go after next?”

headline.main: Stirring the Pot and Striking Fear in India
